@string/cos

@string/cot

array.name: description
array.item: sin(x) - the sine of x(radians or degrees depends on the mode)
cos(x) - the cosine of x(radians or degrees depends on the mode)
tan(x) - the tangent of x(radians or degrees depends on the mode)
cot(x) - the cotangent of x(radians or degrees depends on the mode)
asin(x) - the arc sine of x; the result is in the range -pi/2...pi/2(or -90...90, depends on the mode)
acos(x) - the arc cosine of x; the result is in the range 0...pi(or 0...180, depends on the mode)
atan(x) - the arc tangent of x; the result is in the range -pi/2...pi/2(or -90...90, depends on the mode)
acot(x) - the arc cotangent of x; the result is in the range 0...pi(or 0...180, depends on the mode)
sinh(x) - the hyperbolic sine of x
cosh(x) - the hyperbolic cosine of x
tanh(x) - the hyperbolic tangent of x
coth(x) - the hyperbolic cotangent of x
pow(x, y) - x raised to the power of y
sqrt(x) - positive square root of x
exp(x) - e raised to the power of x
log(x, y) - the base x logarithm of y
ln(x) - the natural logarithm of x
log10(x) - the base 10 logarithm of x
abs(x) - the absolute value of x
floor(x) - the largest integer which is less than or equal to x
ceil(x) - the smallest integer which is more than or equal to x
min(x, y) - the smallest of x and y
max(x, y) - the largest of x and y
random() - a random number greater than or equal to 0 and less than 1
round(x) - the closest integer to x
signum(x) - 0 if x = 0; 1 if x greater than 0; -1 if x less than 0
fact(x) - the factorial of x where x is a non-negative integer
mod(x, y) - x mod y; the result is always positive
